'''Inagi Misato''' was a shrine maiden who lived 500 years ago and was the friend of [[Kitsune Saiguu]]. She is a member of the [[Inagi Clan]] and the ancestor of [[Inagi Hotomi]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Yougou Cleansing}}</ref>
